Mint

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _dynamic_attributes=”link_option_url” width=”90%” custom_margin=”-35px||||false|false” custom_padding=”2px|||||” link_option_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjExOTUifX0=@” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.pandimensionals.io/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/Orbit.png” title_text=”Orbit” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” border_radii=”on|650px|650px|650px|650px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”23px” text_line_height=”1em” header_letter_spacing=”-3px” header_line_height=”0em” header_3_font=”Rubik||||||||” header_3_text_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Pandimensionals

Phase 1

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” global_colors_info=”{}”]

A collection of thousands of NFTs brimming with utility. These Pandimensional warp-drive engineers known in their home dimension as Phanackapans are hopelessly in love with Cherryade (which they use in their ritualistic festivals).

Token: ERC-721 tokens on Ethereum

Presale Price: 0.05 ETH – Buy 1 get 2 FREE

Public Price: 0.05 ETH each

Quantity: 4242

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjExOTUifX0=@” button_text=”Pandi… what?” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”30px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ width=”90%” custom_margin=”-35px||||false|false” custom_padding=”110px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.pandimensionals.io/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/merry-dance.jpg” alt=”Merry Dance Cherryade Bar” title_text=”Merry Dance Cherryade Bar” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”91%” module_alignment=”center” border_radii=”on|500px|500px|500px|500px” border_width_all=”6px” border_color_all=”#FFFFFF” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_blur=”22px” box_shadow_spread=”9px” box_shadow_color=”#0d72e5″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”23px” text_line_height=”1em” header_letter_spacing=”-3px” header_line_height=”0em” header_3_font=”Rubik||||||||” header_3_text_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The Cherryade Bar

Opening in Phase 2

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Pandimensionals love a drop or two of Cherryade, so we’ll be opening a Cherryade bar to feed all your thirsty Pandimensionals. But be warned, Cherryade does peculiar things to Pandimensionals.

 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://twitter.com/Pandimensionals” button_text=”Follow us for updates” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”30px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ disabled_on=”on|on|on” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ width=”90%” custom_margin=”-35px||||false|false” custom_padding=”110px|||||” disabled=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”http://www.pandimensionals.io/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/beepity-bot@2x.png” title_text=”beepity bot@2x” url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6Ijg3OCJ9fQ==@” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _dynamic_attributes=”url” _module_preset=”default” border_radii=”on|244px|244px|244px|244px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”23px” text_line_height=”1em” header_letter_spacing=”-3px” header_line_height=”0em” header_3_font=”Rubik||||||||” header_3_text_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Beepity Bots

Dropping 2022

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” global_colors_info=”{}”]

This upcoming collection of limited edition NFTs are psychedelic sentient psychiatrists. Deployed on Kalaxion warships to mend the broken minds of their overlords, they just wanna be your next BFF.

Token: ERC-721 tokens on Ethereum

Cost: TBC

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6Ijg3OCJ9fQ==@” button_text=”Beepity what?” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”30px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ width=”90%” custom_margin=”-35px||||false|false” custom_padding=”110px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”http://www.pandimensionals.io/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/void.jpg” title_text=”void” url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjgzMiJ9fQ==@” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _dynamic_attributes=”url” _module_preset=”default” border_radii=”on|244px|244px|244px|244px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”23px” text_line_height=”1em” header_letter_spacing=”-3px” header_line_height=”0em” header_3_font=”Rubik||||||||” header_3_text_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

THE VOID

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” global_colors_info=”{}”]

This upcoming short-run of single edition super-rare NFTs will be auctioned – with 100% of profits donated to The Ocean Cleanup.

Token: TBC

Cost: Auction

Editions: Short-run of single editions

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjgzMiJ9fQ==@” button_text=”Find out more” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”30px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ width=”90%” custom_margin=”-35px||||false|false” custom_padding=”110px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”http://www.pandimensionals.io/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/shadow-machine.jpg” title_text=”shadow-machine” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” border_radii=”on|244px|244px|244px|244px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”23px” text_line_height=”1em” header_letter_spacing=”-3px” header_line_height=”0em” header_3_font=”Rubik||||||||” header_3_text_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The Shadow Machines

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”0px|0px|1px|0px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

This upcoming short-run collection will show you the inner workings of THE VOID in all their disturbing detail. Imagine Hieronymous Bosch and HR Geiger had a baby, then MC Escher raised it on a diet of Dante, H. P. Lovecraft and psilocybin. These highly detailed creations depicting the mysterious Shadow Machines will be a must-have for any discerning Pandimensional collector.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://twitter.com/Pandimensionals” button_text=”Follow us for updates” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”30px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Our Services” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ background_color=”#000000″ background_color_gradient_start=”#2e3857″ background_color_gradient_end=”#212529″ background_enable_image=”off” background_position=”bottom_center” custom_padding=”100px|0px|5px|0px||” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” global_module=”1250″ saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row admin_label=”New standard of payments” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ width=”100%” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”20px” width=”90%” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Special words from special people

Read review from some of our happy customers.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ width=”90%” custom_margin=”-35px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” custom_padding=”30px|10px|30px|10px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”http://www.pandimensionals.io/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/21-e1638005320301.png” alt=”Pandimensional NFT” title_text=”21″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” width=”80%” module_alignment=”center” border_radii=”on|244px|244px|244px|244px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”19px” header_3_font=”Rubik||||||||” header_3_text_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_margin=”38px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Klurgle Sphinkter

Starship Gunner

I often woke up in the night screaming, perhaps due to the stresses of interstellar battles. But since I got my Pandimensional, I just don’t sleep at all. Thank you PTCo.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” custom_padding=”30px|10px|30px|10px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”http://www.pandimensionals.io/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/16.jpg” alt=”Pandimensional NFT” title_text=”16″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” width=”80%” module_alignment=”center” border_radii=”on|244px|244px|244px|244px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”19px” header_3_font=”Rubik||||||||” header_3_text_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_margin=”38px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Arthuuur Flvck

Part-time Clown

I hated myself, everything about me. My face, my involuntary chuckle, my skinny back, my weird limp. But my Pandimensional has taught me to see the funny side. Now who’s laughing mom?

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ custom_margin=”-35px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” custom_padding=”30px|10px|30px|10px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”http://www.pandimensionals.io/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/9.png” title_text=”9″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” width=”80%” module_alignment=”center” border_radii=”on|244px|244px|244px|244px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”19px” header_3_font=”Rubik||||||||” header_3_text_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_margin=”38px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Karen T.

Boomer

I don’t know why, but I always felt compelled to berate store clerks and to speak to the manager of every store I visited. My Pandimensional has helped me live, laugh and love again.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” custom_padding=”30px|10px|30px|10px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”http://www.pandimensionals.io/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/12.png” title_text=”12″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” width=”80%” module_alignment=”center” border_radii=”on|244px|244px|244px|244px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”19px” header_3_font=”Rubik||||||||” header_3_text_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_margin=”38px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

XTC_23

Pro Gamer

Gaming is my life, I became addicted and my mom wouldn’t give me a break. So I got her a Pandimensional for her birthday, now she just sits in the corner grinning and leaves me alone. PTCo. rocks.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Section” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#000000″ da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” global_module=”1434″ saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

How do I mint an NFT?

Please connect your Metamask wallet and ensure you have enough Ethereum to cover the cost of the NFT and the gas fee. If you need help, please check our FAQs for more information on how to buy an NFT. Thank you.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjEyMzcifX0=@” button_text=”Read the FAQs” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”30px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Our Services” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ background_color=”#000000″ custom_padding=”100px|0px|100px|0px|false|false” top_divider_color=”rgba(80,192,207,0.35)” top_divider_height=”50px” top_divider_flip=”horizontal” top_divider_arrangement=”above_content” top_divider_height_tablet=”50px” top_divider_height_phone=”20px” top_divider_height_last_edited=”on|desktop” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” global_module=”819″ saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||10px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_divider color=”rgba(126,190,197,0.45)” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The Pandimensionals is an NFT art collection of 2D illustrated NFTs. Use your Pandimensional NFT as your profile picture on social media and stand out from the crowd. We’ve designed the Pandimensional NFTs to be representative of everyone, no matter your ethnicity, faith, gender or sexuality. If you’re looking for cool NFTs to use on your Twitter, Facebook or other social media account, you won’t find a better one than a Pandimensional NFT.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
